listitem.para: void SDIO_ITConfig ( uint32_t SDIO_IT, FunctionalState NewState)

section.title: void SDIO_DeInit (void)
section.emphasis: Deinitializes the SDIO peripheral registers to their default reset values.

section.title: void SDIO_Init (SDIO_InitTypeDef *SDIO_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the SDIO peripheral according to the specified parameters in the SDIO_InitStruct.

entry.para: : pointer to a SDIO_InitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the SDIO peripheral.

section.title: void SDIO_StructInit (SDIO_InitTypeDef *SDIO_InitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each SDIO_InitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to an SDIO_InitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: void SDIO_ClockCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the SDIO Clock.

entry.para: new state of the SDIO Clock. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_SetPowerState (uint32_t SDIO_PowerState)
section.emphasis: Sets the power status of the controller.

entry.para:
new state of the Power state. This parameter can be one of the following values:
SDIO_PowerState_OFF: SDIO Power OFF
SDIO_PowerState_ON: SDIO Power ON

section.title: uint32_t SDIO_GetPowerState (void)
section.emphasis: Gets the power status of the controller.

entry.para:
status of the controller. The returned value can be one of the following values:
0x00: Power OFF
0x02: Power UP
0x03: Power ON

section.title: void SDIO_SendCommand (SDIO_CmdInitTypeDef *SDIO_CmdInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the SDIO Command according to the specified parameters in the SDIO_CmdInitStruct and send the command.

entry.para: : pointer to a SDIO_CmdInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the SDIO command.

section.title: void SDIO_CmdStructInit (SDIO_CmdInitTypeDef *SDIO_CmdInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each SDIO_CmdInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to an SDIO_CmdInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: uint8_t SDIO_GetCommandResponse (void)
section.emphasis: Returns command index of last command for which response received.

entry.para: the command index of the last command response received.

section.title: uint32_t SDIO_GetResponse (uint32_t SDIO_RESP)
section.emphasis: Returns response received from the card for the last command.

entry.para:
Specifies the SDIO response register. This parameter can be one of the following values:
SDIO_RESP1: Response Register 1
SDIO_RESP2: Response Register 2
SDIO_RESP3: Response Register 3
SDIO_RESP4: Response Register 4
Corresponding response register value.

section.title: void SDIO_DataConfig (SDIO_DataInitTypeDef *SDIO_DataInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Initializes the SDIO data path according to the specified parameters in the SDIO_DataInitStruct.

entry.para: : pointer to a SDIO_DataInitTypeDef structure that contains the configuration information for the SDIO command.

section.title: void SDIO_DataStructInit (SDIO_DataInitTypeDef *SDIO_DataInitStruct)
section.emphasis: Fills each SDIO_DataInitStruct member with its default value.

entry.para: pointer to an SDIO_DataInitTypeDef structure which will be initialized.

section.title: uint32_t SDIO_GetDataCounter (void)
section.emphasis: Returns number of remaining data bytes to be transferred.

entry.para: of remaining data bytes to be transferred

section.title: uint32_t SDIO_ReadData (void)
section.emphasis: Read one data word from Rx FIFO.

entry.para: received

section.title: void SDIO_WriteData (uint32_t Data)
section.emphasis: Write one data word to Tx FIFO.

entry.para: 32-bit data word to write.

section.title: uint32_t SDIO_GetFIFOCount (void)
section.emphasis: Returns the number of words left to be written to or read from FIFO.

entry.para: number of words.

section.title: void SDIO_StartSDIOReadWait (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Starts the SD I/O Read Wait operation.

entry.para: new state of the Start SDIO Read Wait operation. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_StopSDIOReadWait (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Stops the SD I/O Read Wait operation.

entry.para: new state of the Stop SDIO Read Wait operation. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_SetSDIOReadWaitMode (uint32_t SDIO_ReadWaitMode)
section.emphasis: Sets one of the two options of inserting read wait interval.

entry.para:
SD I/O Read Wait operation mode. This parameter can be:
SDIO_ReadWaitMode_CLK: Read Wait control by stopping SDIOCLK
SDIO_ReadWaitMode_DATA2: Read Wait control using SDIO_DATA2

section.title: void SDIO_SetSDIOOperation (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the SD I/O Mode Operation.

entry.para: new state of SDIO specific operation. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_SendSDIOSuspendCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the SD I/O Mode suspend command sending.

entry.para: new state of the SD I/O Mode suspend command. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_CommandCompletionCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the command completion signal.

entry.para: new state of command completion signal. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_CEATAITCmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the CE-ATA interrupt.

entry.para: new state of CE-ATA interrupt. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_SendCEATACmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Sends CE-ATA command (CMD61).

entry.para: new state of CE-ATA command. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_DMACmd (FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the SDIO DMA request.

entry.para: new state of the selected SDIO DMA request. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: void SDIO_ITConfig (uint32_t SDIO_IT, FunctionalState NewState)
section.emphasis: Enables or disables the SDIO interrupts.

entry.para:
specifies the SDIO interrupt sources to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be one or a combination of the following values:
SDIO_IT_CCRCFAIL: Command response received (CRC check failed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_DCRCFAIL: Data block sent/received (CRC check failed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CTIMEOUT: Command response timeout interrupt
SDIO_IT_DTIMEOUT: Data timeout interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXUNDERR: Transmit FIFO underrun error interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXOVERR: Received FIFO overrun error interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDREND: Command response received (CRC check passed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDSENT: Command sent (no response required) interrupt
SDIO_IT_DATAEND: Data end (data counter, SDIDCOUNT, is zero) interrupt
SDIO_IT_STBITERR: Start bit not detected on all data signals in wide bus mode interrupt
SDIO_IT_DBCKEND: Data block sent/received (CRC check passed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDACT: Command transfer in progress interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXACT: Data transmit in progress interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXACT: Data receive in progress interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXFIFOHE: Transmit FIFO Half Empty interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXFIFOHF: Receive FIFO Half Full interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXFIFOF: Transmit FIFO full interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXFIFOF: Receive FIFO full interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXFIFOE: Transmit FIFO empty interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXFIFOE: Receive FIFO empty interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXDAVL: Data available in transmit FIFO interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXDAVL: Data available in receive FIFO interrupt
SDIO_IT_SDIOIT: SD I/O interrupt received interrupt
SDIO_IT_CEATAEND: CE-ATA command completion signal received for CMD61 interrupt
new state of the specified SDIO interrupts. This parameter can be: ENABLE or DISABLE.

section.title: FlagStatus SDIO_GetFlagStatus (uint32_t SDIO_FLAG)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified SDIO flag is set or not.

entry.para:
specifies the flag to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
SDIO_FLAG_CCRCFAIL: Command response received (CRC check failed)
SDIO_FLAG_DCRCFAIL: Data block sent/received (CRC check failed)
SDIO_FLAG_CTIMEOUT: Command response timeout
SDIO_FLAG_DTIMEOUT: Data timeout
SDIO_FLAG_TXUNDERR: Transmit FIFO underrun error
SDIO_FLAG_RXOVERR: Received FIFO overrun error
SDIO_FLAG_CMDREND: Command response received (CRC check passed)
SDIO_FLAG_CMDSENT: Command sent (no response required)
SDIO_FLAG_DATAEND: Data end (data counter, SDIDCOUNT, is zero)
SDIO_FLAG_STBITERR: Start bit not detected on all data signals in wide bus mode.
SDIO_FLAG_DBCKEND: Data block sent/received (CRC check passed)
SDIO_FLAG_CMDACT: Command transfer in progress
SDIO_FLAG_TXACT: Data transmit in progress
SDIO_FLAG_RXACT: Data receive in progress
SDIO_FLAG_TXFIFOHE: Transmit FIFO Half Empty
SDIO_FLAG_RXFIFOHF: Receive FIFO Half Full
SDIO_FLAG_TXFIFOF: Transmit FIFO full
SDIO_FLAG_RXFIFOF: Receive FIFO full
SDIO_FLAG_TXFIFOE: Transmit FIFO empty
SDIO_FLAG_RXFIFOE: Receive FIFO empty
SDIO_FLAG_TXDAVL: Data available in transmit FIFO
SDIO_FLAG_RXDAVL: Data available in receive FIFO
SDIO_FLAG_SDIOIT: SD I/O interrupt received
SDIO_FLAG_CEATAEND: CE-ATA command completion signal received for CMD61
new state of SDIO_FLAG (SET or RESET).

section.title: void SDIO_ClearFlag (uint32_t SDIO_FLAG)
section.emphasis: Clears the SDIO's pending flags.

entry.para:
specifies the flag to clear. This parameter can be one or a combination of the following values:
SDIO_FLAG_CCRCFAIL: Command response received (CRC check failed)
SDIO_FLAG_DCRCFAIL: Data block sent/received (CRC check failed)
SDIO_FLAG_CTIMEOUT: Command response timeout
SDIO_FLAG_DTIMEOUT: Data timeout
SDIO_FLAG_TXUNDERR: Transmit FIFO underrun error
SDIO_FLAG_RXOVERR: Received FIFO overrun error
SDIO_FLAG_CMDREND: Command response received (CRC check passed)
SDIO_FLAG_CMDSENT: Command sent (no response required)
SDIO_FLAG_DATAEND: Data end (data counter, SDIDCOUNT, is zero)
SDIO_FLAG_STBITERR: Start bit not detected on all data signals in wide bus mode
SDIO_FLAG_DBCKEND: Data block sent/received (CRC check passed)
SDIO_FLAG_SDIOIT: SD I/O interrupt received
SDIO_FLAG_CEATAEND: CE-ATA command completion signal received for CMD61

section.title: ITStatus SDIO_GetITStatus (uint32_t SDIO_IT)
section.emphasis: Checks whether the specified SDIO interrupt has occurred or not.

entry.para:
specifies the SDIO interrupt source to check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
SDIO_IT_CCRCFAIL: Command response received (CRC check failed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_DCRCFAIL: Data block sent/received (CRC check failed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CTIMEOUT: Command response timeout interrupt
SDIO_IT_DTIMEOUT: Data timeout interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXUNDERR: Transmit FIFO underrun error interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXOVERR: Received FIFO overrun error interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDREND: Command response received (CRC check passed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDSENT: Command sent (no response required) interrupt
SDIO_IT_DATAEND: Data end (data counter, SDIDCOUNT, is zero) interrupt
SDIO_IT_STBITERR: Start bit not detected on all data signals in wide bus mode interrupt
SDIO_IT_DBCKEND: Data block sent/received (CRC check passed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDACT: Command transfer in progress interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXACT: Data transmit in progress interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXACT: Data receive in progress interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXFIFOHE: Transmit FIFO Half Empty interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXFIFOHF: Receive FIFO Half Full interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXFIFOF: Transmit FIFO full interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXFIFOF: Receive FIFO full interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXFIFOE: Transmit FIFO empty interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXFIFOE: Receive FIFO empty interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXDAVL: Data available in transmit FIFO interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXDAVL: Data available in receive FIFO interrupt
SDIO_IT_SDIOIT: SD I/O interrupt received interrupt
SDIO_IT_CEATAEND: CE-ATA command completion signal received for CMD61 interrupt
new state of SDIO_IT (SET or RESET).

section.title: void SDIO_ClearITPendingBit (uint32_t SDIO_IT)
section.emphasis: Clears the SDIO's interrupt pending bits.

entry.para:
specifies the interrupt pending bit to clear. This parameter can be one or a combination of the following values:
SDIO_IT_CCRCFAIL: Command response received (CRC check failed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_DCRCFAIL: Data block sent/received (CRC check failed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CTIMEOUT: Command response timeout interrupt
SDIO_IT_DTIMEOUT: Data timeout interrupt
SDIO_IT_TXUNDERR: Transmit FIFO underrun error interrupt
SDIO_IT_RXOVERR: Received FIFO overrun error interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDREND: Command response received (CRC check passed) interrupt
SDIO_IT_CMDSENT: Command sent (no response required) interrupt
SDIO_IT_DATAEND: Data end (data counter, SDIO_DCOUNT, is zero) interrupt
SDIO_IT_STBITERR: Start bit not detected on all data signals in wide bus mode interrupt
SDIO_IT_SDIOIT: SD I/O interrupt received interrupt
SDIO_IT_CEATAEND: CE-ATA command completion signal received for CMD61
